content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 May 2018What are the possible CC to apply if my take home pay is $2K after CPF deduction is $1.6K?1 answerAnswerBump2
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Chen ZhirongLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 May 2018Hi, you may wish to consider a debit card instead as most creditcards have a minimum 30k or about 2.5k/monthly (excluding bonus) to apply. ​Nonetheless some cards you can apply for are: https://www.dinersclub.com.sg/en/ace/​http://www.bankofchina.com/sg/bcservice/bc1/201407/t20140721_3653053.html​https://www.sc.com/sg/credit-cards/manhattan-500-card/​Source: https://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/money-mind-210/credit-card-annual-income-lower-than-30k-5740565.html​Recommended reading: https://www.singsaver.com.sg/blog/can-you-get-a-credit-card-on-low-or-no-income0 comments3
